about_ext_description.message: Versleutel het Web! Gebruik HTTPS Everywhere automatisch op vele websites.

cancel_he_blocking_explainer.message: Breeze noticed you were navigating to a non-HTTPS page, and tried to send you to the HTTPS version instead. The HTTPS version is unavailable. Most likely this site does not support HTTPS, but it is also possible that an attacker is blocking the HTTPS version.

no_https_disclaimer.message:
WARNING: If you choose to continue to this page insecurely, Breeze cannot protect your privacy and security.
NEVER ENTER ANY PERSONAL INFORMATION INTO A SITE THAT DOES NOT SUPPORT HTTPS
All of your activity on this site including the pages you visit, any passwords, credit card info, or personal details manually entered will be visible in plain text to any servers or individuals listening in the middle and should be assumed compromised.

cancel_http_once.message: Open insecure page for this session only

chrome_add_new_rule.message: Voeg een nieuwe regel toe voor deze site

chrome_add_rule.message: Voeg een regel toe voor deze site

chrome_always_https_for_host.message: Gebruik altijd https voor deze host

chrome_disable_on_this_site.message: Disable HTTPS Everywhere on this site

chrome_enable_on_this_site.message: Enable HTTPS Everywhere on this site

chrome_experimental_rules_description.message: Kan waarschuwing of defecten veroorzaken. Standaard uitgeschakeld.

chrome_settings_for_this_site_explained.message: As you browse different websites, you can change your preferences for each website

chrome_settings_for_this_site_subheader.message: Change your preferences for encrypted connections

chrome_stable_rules_description.message: Forceer geëncrypteerde verbindingen naar deze websites:

menu_encryptAllSitesEligibleOff.message: Encrypt All Sites Eligible is OFF

menu_encryptAllSitesEligibleOn.message: Encrypt All Sites Eligible is ON

menu_httpNoWhereMore.message: This mode blocks unencrypted content and requests

onboarding_footer.message: HTTPS Everywhere is an EFF project

onboarding_intro.message: Versleutel het Web! Gebruik HTTPS Everywhere automatisch op vele websites.

options_updateChannelsWarning.message: Warning: Adding update channels can cause attackers to hijack your browser. Only edit this section if you know what you're doing!

prefs_reset_defaults_message.message: This will reset each ruleset to its default state. Continue?
